璡字的基本解释

璡
jīn
见“琎”。

璡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīn］
［《廣韻》將鄰切，平真，精。］
［《廣韻》即刃切，去震，精。］
“琎1”的繁体字。
(1)似玉的美石。
(2)多用于人名。南朝齐有刘琎，唐有窦琎。

璡字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璡； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页742第12
【唐韻】將鄰切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】資辛切，?音津。【說文】石之似玉者。　又人名。【劉峻·辯命論】近世有沛國劉瓛，瓛弟璡，?一時之秀士也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?卽刃切，音晉。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīn］
["Guang Yun" cuts neighbors, plain and precise. ]
["Guangyun" means cutting with blades, de-shocked, and refined. ]
Traditional characters for "琎1".
(1) Beautiful stone like jade.
(2) Mostly used for names. There was Liu Qin in the Southern Dynasties and Dou Qin in the Tang Dynasty.

[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　琎; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 742-12
[Tang Yun] cut neighbors [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Zixi,? Yinjin. [Said the text] The stone is like jade.　Another name. [Liu Jun·Debate on Fate] In modern times, there is Liu Wei from Peiguo, and his younger brother Jin, who is also a talented person of the time.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cut with a blade, sound Jin. The same meaning.
